description:
Gather every month. Make experimental games.Pack them all. And sell it for 0.99 USD.This month we made 2 games.[BlinkGhost] by Jaehyun YooDon't blink your eyes.

* You need webcam for this game.

[BTBTBT] by Jeawon Yoo, Sun Park, Jooeun Hwang

Move your heart, manage other health status, and survive.
